entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
